Episodes.Title: The Arrangement
Episodes.Plot: The merger complete, Jessica's new partnership with Darby is tested when he assigns Harvey a high-profile client, an oil baroness named Ava Hessington, who has a deeper past with Darby than originally thought. Mike works to reconcile with Harvey, while also trying to manage the fallout from his revelation to Rachel. Meanwhile, Louis convinces Darby to give him quartermaster responsibilities at the firm over his rival, Nigel, but the move backfires when Nigel is put in charge of something even mo

Episodes.Title: I Want You to Want Me
Episodes.Plot: Louis offers Mike a case and partnership that could change his future at the firm. Harvey and Jessica team up to keep Ava Hessington out of jail, but their case is complicated by an old nemesis of Harvey's, disgraced former DA Cameron Dennis.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and sexual references

Episodes.Title: Unfinished Business
Episodes.Plot: Cameron has Harvey's client arrested for murder. Meanwhile, Katrina tries to win over Louis and a British version of Harvey arrives at the firm.

Episodes.Title: Conflict of Interest
Episodes.Plot: Harvey?s defense of Ava hits a roadblock when the interests of her murder trial are at odds with Louis? work to thwart a hostile takeover of Hessington Oil by a rival businessman.

Episodes.Title: Shadow of a Doubt
Episodes.Plot: Lines between the personal and the professional get blurred when Harvey and Stephen work together on Ava's case, and Mike invites Rachel to join him on a case that gets complicated when his secret falls in the line of fire -- with Rachel's parents.

Episodes.Title: The Other Time
Episodes.Plot: Cameron?s continuing use of shady tactics on Ava?s case brings up memories of why Harvey left the DA?s office to work for Jessica. As Rachel visits law schools, Mike looks back on what cost him his one chance at a degree.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Drug use and offensive language

Episodes.Title: She's Mine
Episodes.Plot: Harvey clashes with Stephen over Ava?s case, among other issues. Meanwhile, things are still tense between Harvey and Jessica as they strategize how best to defend Ava. And Louis enlists Rachel in his battle with Nigel over a broken contract? and heart.

Episodes.Title: Endgame
Episodes.Plot: As Ava Hessington?s murder trial begins, Harvey, Mike and Jessica fight off betrayal from both inside the firm and out. Meanwhile, Louis and Donna seek to even the score with those who have done them wrong.

Episodes.Title: Bad Faith
Episodes.Plot: Pearson Darby Specter?s ?divorce" brings trust issues to the forefront. Harvey finds himself battling Scottie once again and Louis convinces Jessica to let him handle the dissolution talks. Meanwhile, Mike asks Rachel to take a big step forward in their relationship.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and sexual references

Episodes.Title: Stay
Episodes.Plot: An old nemesis returns to complicate the Pearson Darby negotiations and put Harvey and Scottie on opposite sides once again. Meanwhile, recruiting a new hire puts Louis in Sheila?s crosshairs, and Mike and Rachel find themselves in Jessica?s crosshairs.

Episodes.Title: Buried Secrets
Episodes.Plot: Things get complicated when Harvey mixes business with pleasure and gets caught between Jessica and Scottie. Painful memories plague Mike as he uses a case to exorcise demons against an old foe, while Louis? suspicions threaten to expose Mike.

Episodes.Title: Yesterday's Gone
Episodes.Plot: Both Mike and Jessica lean on Harvey for support when things from their respective pasts throw them off their game.

Episodes.Title: Moot Point
Episodes.Plot: Harvey faces an old rival from law school; Jessica tries to stay out of Louis and Scottie's feud.

Episodes.Title: Heartburn
Episodes.Plot: A major client demands that Harvey and Mike perform an unpleasant task; Louis faces a difficult challenge; Rachel collects an old debt.

Episodes.Title: Know When to Fold 'Em
Episodes.Plot: A persistent attorney goes after one of Harvey's clients; Mike is faced with a difficult decision; former name partner Charles Van Dyke returns with revenge on his mind.

Episodes.Title: No Way Out
Episodes.Plot: Things are anything but business as usual when Harvey and Mike find themselves at odds with a tenacious U.S. Attorney. Scottie and Harvey can?t seem to get on the same page and Mike and Rachel clash over plans for the future.
